bwwExcerpt: The producers are banking on Vanessa Hudgens, the wonderfully talented star of Disney's blockbuster film "High School Musical" and the sequels, to attract a younger audience. She has the tough task of playing a young, naive, adorable 18 year old known as "Gigi". In the first act, she is all "giggles" and runs around the stage like a typical young teenager looking for fun and enjoyment. I was tempted to say "I'll have what she's having." She has a zest for life, a good voice and moves well. Wheth
